thread.title: Evgeni Pritsker
thread.title_full: BOSS LASER reviewed by Evgeni Pritsker

author: Evgeni Pritsker
title: Evgeni Pritsker
text:
I am very much thankful for boss laser support team specially Allen he took his time to explain to me step by step to resolve my problem
He was very patient with me to the end
Thank you very much for all your support and great product I will definitely use both laser in the future
